maqras.text: 26|1|ta sim mim. (Napiye!) Ivai telivana ivvetattin vacanankalakum
26|2|ta sim mim. (Napiye!) Ivai telivana ivvetattin vacanankalakum
26|3|(napiye!) Avarkal (um'mai) nampikkai kollatatan karanamaka (tukkattal) ninkal tarkolai ceytu kolvir polum
26|4|nam virumpinal avarkalutaiya kaluttukal panintu kunintu varumpati (vetanai) ceyyakkutiya attatcikalai vanattiliruntu avarkal mitu nam irakkiyiruppom
26|5|rahmanitamiruntu putitana oru nallupatecam varumpotellam atai avarkal (nirakarittu) purakkanikkamal iruppatillai
26|6|(Akave, itaiyum) niccayamaka avarkal poyyakkukinranar. Eninum, avarkal etaip (poyyakkip) parikacittuk kontirukkirarkalo atan (unmai) ceytikal niccayamaka avarkalitam vante tirum
26|7|avarkal pumiyaip parkkavillaiya? Atil ovvoru vakaiyilum (payanalikkak kutiya) melana ettanaiyo purpuntukalai joti jotiyakave nam mulaippittu irukkirom
26|8|niccayamaka itil or attatci irukkiratu. Eninum, avarkalil perumpalanavarkal nampikkai kollavillai
26|9|(napiye!) Umatu iraivan niccayamaka (anaivaraiyum) mikaittavan,maka karunaiyutaiyavan avan
26|10|(napiye!) Umatu iraivan musavai alaittu ‘‘nir aniyayakkararkalana hpir'avnutaiya makkalitam celviraka'' enak kuriyatai nir kavanittup parppiraka
26|11|‘‘avarkal (enakkup) payappata mattarkala?'' (Enru umatu iraivan kettan)
26|12|atarku avar ‘‘en iraivane! Avarkal ennaip poyyakki vituvarkal ena nan payappatukiren'' enrar
26|13|innum, “(avvaru avarkal poyyakkinal) en manamutaintu vitum. (Attutan enakkuk konal iruppatal) en naval (cariyakap) pecamutiyatu. Atalal (ennutan) varumaru harunukku ni arivippayaka
26|14|melum, en mitu avarkalukku oru kurraccattutalum irukkiratu. Atarkaka avarkal ennaik kolai ceytu vituvarkal ena nan payappatukiren'' (enrum kurinar)

26|15|atarku (iraivan) kuriyatavatu: ‘‘Avvaralla (payappatatir; harunaiyum alaittuk kontu) ninkal iruvarum en attatcikalai (etuttu)k kontu cellunkal. Niccayamaka nan unkalutan iruntu (anaittaiyum) kettuk kontiruppen
26|16|Akave, ninkaliruvarum hpir'avnitam cenru, ‘‘niccayamaka nankal ulakattar anaivaraiyum pataittu paripalippavanin tutarkalavom
26|17|akave, ‘‘israyilin cantatikalai ni enkalutan anuppivitu'' enak kurunkal! (Enpatakavum kattalaiyittan)

26|18|(avvare avarkal hpir'avnitam cenru kurave) atarkavan (musavai nokki) “nankal um'maik kulantaiyaka etuttukkontu valarkkavillaiya? Nir (umatu valipattai ataiyum varai) pala varutankal nam'mitam valntiruntir
26|19|nir cey(yat taka)ta (oru) kariyattaiyum ceytir! (Atai mannittiruntum) nir nanri kettavarakave irukkirir'' enran
26|20|atarku musa kurinar: ‘‘Nan ariyatavanaka irunta nilaimaiyil atai nan ceyten
26|21|atalal nan unkalukkup payantu unkalai vittum otivitten. Eninum, en iraivan enakku nanattaik kotuttut tan tutarakavum ennai akkinan
26|22|akave, ni israyilin cantatikalai atimaiyaka vaittuk kontirukkum nilaimaiyil, itu ni enakkuc colli kanpikkak kutiya oru nanriyakuma?'' (Ivvaru musa kurinar)
26|23|‘‘ulakattarin iraivan yar?'' Ena hpir'avn kettan

26|24|atarku (musa) ‘‘vanankal, pumi innum ivarrukku mattiyil ullavarrin iraivantan (ulakattarin iraivanum avan). (Ivvunmaiyai) ninkal nampikkai kolpavarkalaka iruntal (nampikkai kollunkal)'' enru kurinar
26|25|atarkavan, tannaic cula iruntavarkalai nokki ‘‘ninkal itaic ceviyura villaiya?'' Enru kurinan
26|26|atarkavar ‘‘ (avantan) unkal iraivanum (unkalukku) mun cenru pona unkal mutataikalin iraivanum avan'' enru kurinar
26|27|Atarku (hpir'avn avarkalai nokki) ‘‘unkalitam anuppappatta(takak kurum) intat tutar niccayamaka cuttap paittiyakkarar'' enru connan
26|28|atarku (musa) ‘‘kil natu mel natu innum itarku mattiyilulla tecankalin iraivanum (avantan). Ninkal arivutaiyavarkalaka iruntal (itai ninkal unarntu kolvirkal)'' enru kurinar
26|29|atarkavan ‘‘ennait tavira (marretanaiyum) nir katavulaka etuttuk kontal niccayamaka nan um'mai ciraippattoril akkivituven'' enru kurinan
26|30|atarkavar ‘‘telivanatoru attatciyai nan unnitam kontu vanta potiluma?'' Enru kettar
26|31|atarkavan ‘‘nir colvatu unmaiyanal, ataik kontu varuviraka'' enru kurinan
26|32|akave, musa tan tatiyai erintar. Utane atu telivana periyatoru pampaki vittatu
26|33|melum, avar tan kaiyai(c cattaip paiyil) ittu veliyil etuttar. Utane atu parppavarkalukku(k kannaik kucacceyyum pirakacamutaiya) venmaiyakat tonriyatu
26|34|(itaik kannurra hpir'avn) tannaic cula irunta piratanikalai nokki, ‘‘niccayamaka ivar tercciperra cuniyakkararaka irukkirar
26|35|ivar tan cuniyattal unkal urai vittum unkalait turattivita ennukirar. Akave, itaipparri ninkal enna kurukirirkal'' enru kettan
26|36|atarkavarkal, ‘‘avarukkum avarutaiya cakotararukkum oru tavanai alittu, tupparipavarkalaip pala urkalukkum anuppivai
26|37|tercciperra cuniyakkararkal anaivaraiyum avarkal (tetip pitittu) um'mitam alaittu varuvarkal'' enru kurinarkal
26|38|(Avvare tupparipavarkal pala urkalukkum anuppivaikkappattu) kuritta nalil, kuritta nerattil (kuritta itattil) cuniyakkararkal anaivarum onru cerkkappattarkal
26|39|ella manitarkalukkum, ‘‘ (kuritta kalattil) ninkal vantu ceruvirkala?'' Enru paraicarrappattatu
26|40|(ivvaru anku kutum) cuniyakkararkal verri kontal (avarkalutaiya markkattaiye) nam pinparravum kutum (enrum parai carrappattatu)
26|41|cuniyakkararkal anaivarum vantapolutu avarkal hpir'avnai nokki ‘‘meyyakave nankal verriperral atarkuriya kuli enkalukku unta?'' Enru kettarkal
26|42|atarkavan ‘‘am (kuli untu.... Kuli mattuma?) Annerattil ninkal (nam capaiyilum virrirukkakkutiya) namakku nerunkiya piramukarkalakavum akivituvirkal'' enru kurinan
26|43|avarkalai nokki musa ‘‘ninkal (cuniyam ceyya) eriyakkutiyatai eriyunkal'' enak kurinar
26|44|akave, avarkal tankal tatikalaiyum, kayirukalaiyum erintu ‘‘hpir'avnutaiya kauravattin mitu cattiyam niccayamaka nankaltan venruvittom'' enru kurinarkal
26|45|piraku musavum tan tatiyai erintar. Atu (periyatoru pampaki,) avarkal karpanai ceytirunta cuniyankal anaittaiyum vilunka arampittu vittatu
26|46|itaik kannurra cuniyakkararkal anaivarum viluntu ciram panintu
26|47|‘‘ulakattar anaivarin iraivanaiye nankal nampikkai kontom
26|48|avan(tan,) musa, harunutaiya iraivanumavan'' enru kurinarkal

26|49|Atarku (hpir'avn), ‘‘nan unkalukku anumati alippatarku munnatakave ninkal avarai nampikkai kontu vittirkal. Niccayamaka unkalukku cuniyam karrukkotutta unkal kuru avartan. (Itan palanai) aticikkirattil ninkal arintu kolvirkal. Unkalai maru kai, maru kal vetti unkal anaivaraiyum ciluvaiyil araintu vituven'' enru kurinan
26|50|atarkavarkal kurinarkal: ‘‘ (Atanal enkalukku) oru patakamumillai. (Enenral) niccayamaka nankal enkal iraivan pakkame tirumpac cenru vituvom
26|51|niccayamaka (musavai) nampikkai kontavarkalil nankal mutanmaiyanavarkalaka irukkum karanattinal, enkal iraivan enkal kurrankalai mannittuvituvan enru niccayamaka nankal nampukirom
